name: BigQuery Export
description: Sends events to a BigQuery database on ingestion.

config.name: JSON file with your google cloud key

config.hint: A table will be created if it does not exist.
config.name: Table ID
Events to ignore
config.hint: Comma separated list of events to ignore

config.name: Upload at most every X minutes
config.hint: If there are events to upload and this many minutes has passed since the last upload, send the events to S3. The value must be between 1 and 60 minutes.

config.name: Maximum upload size in megabytes
config.hint: Always keep the uploaded files below this size limit, uploading more frequently than the time limit if needed. Events are kept in memory until then, so make sure your server has enough of it. The value must be between 1 and 100 MB.
